feed.title: Google Cloud: Dataform
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Dataform

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: Updates to the automatic cataloging of Dataform metadata in Dataplex improve the near real-time [management](https://cloud.google.com/dataplex/docs/catalog-overview) and [search](https://cloud.google.com/dataplex/docs/search-assets) capabilities for repository metadata. These features are [generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) (GA).

entry.title: Announcement
entry.content: Dark theme is now available for BigQuery and Dataform. To turn on the dark theme, go to the Console, open the **Settings and utilities** menu next to your avatar, and select **Preferences**. On the **User preferences** page, select **Appearance** in the navigation, select your color theme, and save your selection.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: You can now use your Google Account user credentials to authorize the creation, scheduling, and running of pipelines, the scheduling of notebooks and data preparations, and the creation of workflow configurations. For more information, see [Schedule runs](https://cloud.google.com/dataform/docs/schedule-runs). This feature is in [preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: You can now use strict act-as mode to enable an additional security check for certain user actions in Dataform. For more information, see [Use strict act-as mode](https://cloud.google.com/dataform/docs/strict-act-as-mode). This feature is in [preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).
